description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Ferry Service Adjustments and Special Public Transport Service Arrangements
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 渡輪服務調整及特別公共運輸服務安排

2025-07-04T20:23:00.CONTENT_EN:
On 7 July 2025 (Monday), the following licensed ferry services will be adjusted. Relevant details and special public transport service arrangements (including free special ferry services) are as follows:

For more details, please visit: https://www.td.gov.hk/en/special_news/spnews.htm

For more details, please visit: https://www.td.gov.hk/en/special_news/spnews.htm

For more details, please visit: https://www.td.gov.hk/en/special_news/spnews.htm


The ferry operators will advise passengers of temporary service adjustments through their websites and/or mobile applications, as well as by displaying notices at relevant piers and inside the vessels. 
On the other hand, the MTR Corporation Limited (MTRCL) will arrange standby trains on Tung Chung Line and Tuen Ma Line in the morning of 7 July for taking passengers if needed. The MTRCL will also deploy additional staff to busier stations to facilitate passenger flow and assist passengers. 




.
2025-07-04T20:23:00.CONTENT_CN:
在2025年7月7日（星期一），以下持牌渡輪服務將作出調整。相關詳情及特別公共運輸服務安排(包括免費特別渡輪服務)如下：

詳情請參看: https://www.td.gov.hk/tc/special_news/spnews.htm



渡輪營辦商會透過網頁及/或手機應用程式，並於相關碼頭及船上張貼通告，通知乘客上述安排。

另外，港鐵公司於7月7 日上午將在東涌綫及屯馬綫安排後備列車候命，在有需要時接載乘客。港鐵公司同時會加派人手到較繁忙車站協助疏導人流和協助乘客。




。

2025-07-06T11:50:00.CONTENT_EN:
As informed by Mainland Railway Authorities, High Speed Rail train services on 6 July 2025 traveling between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and Shanghai Hongqiao Station have been cancelled due to adverse weather conditions. 

Cancelled train services:
To Shanghai Hongqiao: G900
From Shanghai Hongqiao : G899

For latest train schedules, please refer to 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app. Passengers may also check latest train information from the HSR website, mobile app or the information available at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. 

For ticket refunds, please refer to the High Speed Rail website and process within the time stated. Please use the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app.
2025-07-06T11:50:00.CONTENT_CN:
內地鐵路單位通報，由於天氣情況惡劣，2025年7月6日來往香港西九龍站及上海虹橋站的高速鐵路列車車次取消。

已取消的車次:
前往上海虹橋:G900
由上海虹橋出發:G899

有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式。乘客亦可留意於高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。

如需退票，請參閱高速鐵路網頁並於指定日期內辦理。請盡量使用12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式。
